references.paper_title: Efficiently modeling long sequences with structured state spaces
references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational Selective State Space Model (S6), which is the core method adapted and improved upon in this work for video frame interpolation.

references.paper_title: Mamba: Linear-time sequence modeling with selective state spaces
references.reason: This paper presents the improved version of the S6 model, addressing limitations and enhancing efficiency, making it particularly suitable for this application.

references.paper_title: Real-time intermediate flow estimation for video frame interpolation
references.reason: This work provides a strong baseline method in video frame interpolation,  whose architecture and components are partially used in the current work.

references.paper_title: Extracting motion and appearance via inter-frame attention for efficient video frame interpolation
references.reason: This paper introduces a state-of-the-art method that the authors build upon, utilizing some of its components within the proposed architecture.

references.paper_title: Video frame synthesis using deep voxel flow
references.reason: This is a foundational work in video frame interpolation using deep learning techniques, providing a crucial early approach that this work improves upon.
